welcome: Welcome to the world of Pax, %USER%.  It's always disorienting - the locals like to say that the Celestial Winds that brought you here are an enigma.  But you will find close friends, hated enemies, and many many adventures ahead.  You may be wondering what's next now that you've landed.  You can of course check out our forums at https://www.paxroleplay.com .  Here you can find character profiles, ongoing posted RP's, and some general insanity.  You also don't have to stay alone here.  You can invite your friends! Don't forget to deposit your Sanity into the skull shaped baskets - it will do you no good here - and prepare for your new life on Pax.
random: %USER% are teleported into Deep Space.||A vial of Pixie Punch appears in front of %USER%!||A horde of zombies attack! Everyone, get to the safe-house!||Nothing happens....||A cheese tasting banana butler comes by with a plate of fine cheeses.||%USER%'s right hand is now a tentacle.||Badgers have a techno themed flash mob around %USER%.||%USER% is teleported 2m to their left.||%USER% is teleported 2m up.||Free Beer!||Free Beer....is dumped over %USER%'s head!||Everything suddenly tastes like Key Lime Pie.||CP appears on %USER%'s head.||%USER% is glomped by ThornDancer||%USER% is glomped by a stranger.||%USER% is attacked by an army of fluffy bunnies.||%USER% is flattened by a giant carrot.||Someone buys %USER% dinner.||Someone poisons %USER%'s dinner.||CP appears on %USER%'s head.||%USER% is chased by a random Mutant Chicken.||%USER% is chased by a random giant emu.||%USER% is chased by a random utahraptor.||%USER% is chased by a random giant Kiwi.||%USER% is hit on the head by a giant mallet.||Someone suddenly swings a pocky blade at %USER%.||%USER% is chased by a random Garchomp.||%USER% receive a free corndog.||%USER% finds a gold nugget.||CP appears on %USER%'s head.||CP flies around %USER%.||CP appears on CP's head. CP-ception.||Everyone hugs!||Another %USER% appears right next to %USER%!||Tox pokes %USER%!||%USER% finds a can of Sausages.||Everyone in %CHANNEL% recieves a bottle of Pixie Punch||%USER% is quickly dragged into a closet.||%USER% is healed completely||%USER% is escorted across the road by an Old Person||%USER% gets married to a complete stranger||Someone shouts 'BINGO!' in %USER%'s ear just for the fun of it.||%USER% gets run over by an Ambulance||%USER% stops in the middle of a busy street and announces loudly to the world 'I'm Ready!'||Someone gives %USER% a suitcase full of comic books||%USER% realizes that they have left their house completely naked, but shrug it off and carry on anyways||%USER% falls in love with a Kumquat||%CHANNEL% starts singing and dancing like they are in a musical, and after 10 minutes suddenly go about their business as if nothign had happened||Some guy in a Patrick Star Costume comes up to %USER% and shouts, 'Leedle Leedle Leedle Lee'||An Ocean Liner falls out of %USER%'s pocket||%USER% gets hit by a Hamburger||%USER% is dropped into a pool.||%USER% is forced to join a hug party with Keela and Grog!||Au'Marui appears and reminds you to vote for Pax: http://www.toprpsites.com/index.php?a=in&u=darkpsycho||The sky suddenly falls on %USER%||%USER% gets bit by a hamburger||%USER% picks up an alien parasite||%USER% finds themselves refusing a lift from Chuck Norris.  He gets angry and kills two stones with one bird, gets back into his car leaving you alone again, wondering what the hell just happened.||A Piano falls exactly where %USER% is standing||%USER% spontaneously combusts||A huge praying Mantis comes out of the sewer and asks %USER% the way to the bank.
setting: Nottingham,GB|It is a %TEMP% %TIME% at the encempment with %WEATHER%.||Isachsen,CA|The %TEMP% %WEATHER% on Kata greets you as you walk outside at %TIME%.||San Francisco,US|In spite of the %WEATHER%, you approach the Wreck of the Laotzchy on this %TEMP% %TIME%.||Port Angeles,US|It is %TIME% at the Campfire, and you gather around it in the %TEMP% %WEATHER%.||Westhaven-Moonstone,US|You find yourself on an %TIME% stroll through a huge forest of red trees, enjoying the %TEMP% %WEATHER%.||Bishop,US|You stand just outside the Corrupted Cave, the %TEMP% %TIME% %WEATHER% giving you no comfort as you prepare to enter...||Chukhung,NP|Standing on The Pass, you see both planets to either side of you, and deep space unfold before you...||Huntsville,US|It is %TIME% at the Temple of Insanity, and the %TEMP% %WEATHER% cannot put a damper on things.||Atlanta,US|Before you stretches a massive, yawning cavern full of green jelly. Anything that falls in bounces right back up, just as high and equally as fast.||Edmonton,CA|The city of Yeg bustles in the %TIME%, where the %TEMP% %WEATHER% makes no difference.||Hausach,DE|Although %TEMP% at the Corrupted Forest, the %TIME% %WEATHER% cannot hide the foreboding sense of doom...||North Slope Borough,US|You enter the Village of Anos on a %TEMP% %TIME%, seeking rest from the %WEATHER%.||Compiegne,FR|We are pleased to welcome to the Moot Hall this fine %TIME%. It is quite a regal looking place with a large round table, to give the impression that all representatives are equal.||Seoul,KR|In Spite of the %TEMP% %WEATHER%, the H&H is doing a fine business at %TIME%
